page.title: 11MEDIA
page.content: We surveyed round the school and out of school about what programmes people watch on T.V.what newspapers people buy and what magazines people buy. The results of the survey on what newspapers people get are as follows: the Mirror was the most popular but many people read the Telegraph too. When we did the survey on what programmes people watch, a lot of people watched Drama,but it was voted that Films were the most popular.We found out that younger people dont like reading as much, and older people would rather read instead of watching T.V. When we surveyed about what favourite magazines people buy,we found that Smash Hits was popular with the younger people because it was to do with pop records.
